channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal Cloud Foundry -- CredHub Service Broker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal Cloud Foundry -- CredHub Service Broker

item.title: CVE-2018-15795|2024-08-05T10:01:54.667Z -- pivotal%20cloud%20foundry -- credhub%20service%20broker
item.description: Pivotal CredHub Service Broker, versions prior to 1.1.0, uses a guessable form of random number generation in creating service broker's UAA client. A remote malicious user may guess the client secret and obtain or modify credentials for users of the CredHub Service.
